segments.text: It's time for you to wake up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me five more minutes . I'm really tired this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but it's time for you to get ready for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get that , but let me just sleep for a little bit longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're not going to get up in five minutes if I let you fall back asleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Believe me . I will get up and get ready in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's a lot that you need to do this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand , and it will get done after I wake up in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like for you to not be late for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to be on time today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go back to sleep then , but only five more minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
